headline: International Paper Tweaks Executive Pay As Valuation And Momentum Draw Focus
summary: International Paper (NYSE:IP) corrected disclosures under its 2026 Long-Term Incentive Plan, updating performance stock unit awards for executive Joseph R. Saab. The company also granted new performance stock unit and restricted stock unit awards to senior leaders and recent hires. These changes focus on leadership retention and aligning executive incentives with long term company goals. International Paper, a major producer of fiber based packaging and pulp products, sits at the center of...

headline: Is It Time To Reassess International Paper (IP) After Its Recent Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether International Paper is offering good value at its current price, especially after a strong run and mixed longer term returns, this article focuses squarely on what the numbers say about the stock. Over shorter periods the share price has been active, with a 5.4% return over the last week, 14.6% over the last month and 22.0% year to date. Over longer periods, the 1 year return sits at an 8.9% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns are 45.3% and 30.1%...
